identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a 'Cyber-Professional' utility tool that feels like a developer's secret weapon, not a spammy downloader site.

headings.usage: Use for all section titles, hero text, and feature headers. Tracking tight (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for all paragraph text, inputs, and metadata.

Input.style: h-16 text-lg bg-slate-900/50 border-slate-800 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-0 transition-all duration-300 placeholder:text-slate-600
Input.icon: absolute left-4 top-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 text-slate-500 group-focus-within:text-blue-500 transition-colors

Button.primary: h-14 px-8 bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white font-semibold rounded-full shadow-[0_0_20px_-5px_rgba(59,130,246,0.5)] hover:shadow-[0_0_30px_-5px_rgba(59,130,246,0.7)] transition-all active:scale-95
Button.secondary: h-14 px-8 bg-slate-800 hover:bg-slate-700 text-slate-200 font-medium rounded-full border border-slate-700 transition-all

Card.base: bg-slate-900/40 backdrop-blur-md border border-slate-800/60 rounded-2xl p-6 hover:border-slate-700 transition-colors

AdSlot.container: bg-slate-900/30 border border-dashed border-slate-800 rounded-lg flex items-center justify-center text-slate-600 text-xs uppercase tracking-widest
AdSlot.label: Advertisement

hero_section.structure: Centered layout with 'Hero Glow' background. Input field is the protagonist.
elements: H1: 'Download YouTube Videos at Light Speed'
Subtext: 'No ads, no limits, just pure 4K quality.' (Irony: we have ads, but UI feels clean)

ad_placement.desktop: Fixed width (160px or 300px) columns on far left/right of the main container, or integrated into the grid as 'sponsored' tiles.

universal_guidelines.testing: All interactive elements MUST have data-testid attribute (e.g., data-testid='download-btn').
universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure contrast ratio > 4.5:1. Use aria-labels on icon-only buttons.
universal_guidelines.transparency: NEVER use completely transparent backgrounds for headers/dropdowns. Use at least bg-slate-950/80 with backdrop-blur.
universal_guidelines.animations: Use framer-motion for entrance effects. Simple fade-in-up for cards.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. Configure tailwind.config.js to extend the color palette with the 'Cyber-Professional' colors defined above.
3. Create a 'Layout' component that handles the responsive ad sidebars (hidden on mobile, visible on desktop).
4. Build the 'VideoInput' component as the centerpieceâ€”it needs to feel expensive.
5. For the 'Blog', use a simple JSON-based static content system. Do not overengineer a CMS.
6. Ensure the 'Download' button has a loading state that is clearly visible.
